content.query:
USE AC_Transport_serverlessDB;
GO

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS dbo.vwtrip_data;
GO

SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://ajmnugiqxczz6x2poc.dfs.core.windows.net/rawdata/dbo.trip-data.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION='2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
